title: how do i become level 5?
body: ya know it says you have to be Lvl 5 in order to comment on discussions, so i was just wondering how do I do so? thnx for helping

replies.body: Sometimes that boards level just needs a little poking before it updates correctly. By posting here it forced that level to sync up with your Summoner level, and you're showing up as level 30 now ^_^!
